00059     TypeInfoRepository::TypeInfoRepository()
00060     {
00061     }

00063     boost::shared_ptr<TypeInfoRepository> TypeInfoRepository::Instance()
00064     {
00065         if ( typerepos )
00066             return typerepos;
00067         typerepos.reset( new TypeInfoRepository() );
00068 
00069         return typerepos;
00070     }
00071 
00072     TypeInfo* TypeInfoRepository::type( const std::string& name ) const
00073     {
00074         map_t::const_iterator i = data.find( name );
00075         if ( i == data.end() ) {
00076             // try alternate name replace / with dots:
00077             string tkname = "/" + boost::replace_all_copy(boost::replace_all_copy(name, string("."), "/"), "<","</");
00078             i = data.find( tkname );
00079             if ( i == data.end())
00080                 return 0;
00081         }
00082         // found
00083         return i->second;
00084     }
00085 
00086     TypeInfoRepository::~TypeInfoRepository()
00087     {
00088         // because of aliases, we only want unique pointers:
00089         vector<TypeInfo*> todelete = values(data);
00090         sort(todelete.begin(), todelete.end());
00091         vector<TypeInfo*>::iterator begin, last = unique( todelete.begin(), todelete.end() );
00092         begin = todelete.begin();
00093         for( ; begin != last; ++begin )
00094             delete *begin;
00095         delete DataSourceTypeInfo<UnknownType>::TypeInfoObject;
00096         DataSourceTypeInfo<UnknownType>::TypeInfoObject = 0;
00097     }
00098 
00099     TypeInfo* TypeInfoRepository::getTypeById(TypeInfo::TypeId type_id) const {
00100       // Ask each type for its type id name.
00101       map_t::const_iterator i = data.begin();
00102       for (; i != data.end(); ++i){
00103         if (i->second->getTypeId() == type_id)
00104           return i->second;
00105       }
00106       return 0;
00107     }
00108 
00109     TypeInfo* TypeInfoRepository::getTypeById(const char * type_id_name) const {
00110       // Ask each type for its type id name.
00111       map_t::const_iterator i = data.begin();
00112       for (; i != data.end(); ++i){
00113         if (i->second->getTypeId()->name() == type_id_name)
00114           return i->second;
00115       }
00116       return 0;
00117     }
00118 
00119     bool TypeInfoRepository::addType(TypeInfo* t)
00120     {
00121         std::string tname = t->getTypeName();
00122         // keep track of this type:
00123         if ( !t->installTypeInfoObject() ) {
00124             // log reason why in installTypeInfoObject().
00125             delete t;
00126             return false;
00127         }
00128         // keep track of this type:
00129         data[ tname ] = t;
00130 
00131         log(Debug) << "Registered Type '"<<tname <<"' to the Orocos Type System."<<Logger::endl;
00132         for(Transports::iterator it = transports.begin(); it != transports.end(); ++it)
00133             if ( (*it)->registerTransport( tname, t) )
00134                 log(Info) << "Registered new '"<< (*it)->getTransportName()<<"' transport for " << tname <<endlog();
00135         return true;
00136     }
00137 
00138     bool TypeInfoRepository::aliasType(const string& alias, TypeInfo* source)
00139     {
00140         if (source) {
00141             if (data.count(alias) && data[alias] != source)
00142                 delete data[alias];
00143             data[alias] = source;
00144         } else {
00145             log(Error) << "Could not alias type name "<< alias <<" with (null) type info object."<<endlog();
00146             return false;
00147         }
00148         return true;
00149     }

00151     std::vector<std::string> TypeInfoRepository::getTypes() const
00152     {
00153         return keys( data );
00154     }
00155 
00156     string TypeInfoRepository::toDot( const string& type ) const
00157     {
00158         if (type.empty())
00159             return type;
00160         // try alternate name replace / with dots:
00161         string dotname = boost::replace_all_copy(boost::replace_all_copy(type, string("/"), "."), "<.","<");
00162         if ( dotname[0] == '.')
00163             dotname = dotname.substr(1);
00164         return dotname;
00165     }
00166 
00167     std::vector<std::string> TypeInfoRepository::getDottedTypes() const
00168     {
00169         vector<string> result = keys( data );
00170         for( vector<string>::iterator it = result.begin(); it != result.end(); ++it)
00171             *it = toDot(*it);
00172         return result;
00173     }
00174 
00175     void TypeInfoRepository::registerTransport( TransportPlugin* tr )
00176     {
00177         transports.reserve( transports.size() + 1 );
00178         transports.push_back( tr );
00179         // inform transport of existing types.
00180         map_t::const_iterator i = data.begin();
00181         for( ; i != data.end(); ++i )
00182             if ( tr->registerTransport( i->first , i->second ) )
00183                 log(Info) << "Registered new '"<< tr->getTransportName()<<"' transport for " << i->first <<endlog();
00184         // give chance to register fallback protocol:
00185         if ( tr->registerTransport("unknown_t", DataSourceTypeInfo<UnknownType>::getTypeInfo() ) == false )
00186         log(Debug) << "Transport " << tr->getTransportName() << " did not install a fallback handler for 'unknown_t'." <<endlog();
00187     }
00188 
00189     void TypeInfoRepository::logTypeInfo() const
00190     {
00191         // dump the names of all known types
00192         log(Debug) << "Types known to the Orocos Type System."<<Logger::endl;
00193         for(map_t::const_iterator it = data.begin(); it != data.end(); ++it)
00194         {
00195             std::vector<int>    transports;
00196             transports = it->second->getTransportNames();
00197             log(Debug) << "-- " << it->first
00198                           << " (" << (*it).second->getTypeName() << ") protocols [";
00199             for (std::vector<int>::const_iterator   iter=transports.begin();
00200                  iter != transports.end();
00201                  ++iter)
00202             {
00203                 Logger::log() << *iter;
00204             }
00205             Logger::log() << "]" << Logger::endl;
00206         }
00207         // dump the names of all known transports
00208         log(Debug) << "Transports known to the Orocos Type System."<<Logger::endl;
00209         for(Transports::const_iterator it = transports.begin(); it != transports.end(); ++it)
00210         {
00211             log(Debug) << "-- " << (*it)->getTransportName() << Logger::endl;
00212         }
00213     }
